title: Distressed Gill Sans
content:
Hi

Does anyone know of a distressed version of Gill I can get for free (I have the set) just not the time to distress the font.

Thanks

 [‹ Sans Serif text face to complement P22 Zaner Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423051433/http:/typophile.com/node/41519 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type in the Wild ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423051433/http:/typophile.com/node/41517 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dendicott

comments.content: How much type needs to be distressed? You could always follow Yves Peter’s [Tip: The Worn/Weathered/Stamped Look](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423051433/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/tip-the-wornweatheredstamped-look/). You could also try something like Mister Retro’s [Machine Wash Filters](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423051433/http:/www.misterretro.com/image_filters.html).
